faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.a1: Yes, it is a personal open-source project designed to help travelers manage their budget without hidden costs.
faq.q2: Does it work without an internet connection?
faq.a2: Absolutely. The application is designed as a PWA (Progressive Web App) that stores your data locally and syncs it when you regain connection.
faq.a3: Your data is yours. We will soon enable export to CSV and PDF so you can take your accounting wherever you want.
faq.a4: It supports any currency in the world, but is especially optimized for trips to Japan with real-time YEN/EUR conversion.
